website_summaries.verdict: This set of larger sized blocks is ideal for little ones under the age of 3 and comes with enough pieces for siblings to join in on the fun.
pros: Chunky blocks are easy for little hands to grip
Large size is safe for kids under the age of 3
Improves fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination
Large set is ideal for group play and with families
Older kids enjoy these too, opening the door for sibling bonding
Includes booklet for guidance and inspiration
cons: Seems pricey considering the number of pieces, but keep in mind that these blocks are much larger

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandkids who play with them for hours. They love them and get very creative, building dinosaurs, cars, boats and everything they have a mind to. The are easy for the younger toddler and yet the 5 year old likes to play with them as well. We are a no device family for toddlers, so it's important they have something to play with to keep their interest.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1A

customer_reviews.title: Random colors...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but my kid and I were annoyed that the instruction book that came with had directions on how to make objects, however, our set did not have the appropriate colored peices to do so. Seems like they just throw a bunch of random colors in the box. I guess I expected better
customer_reviews.author: Kilosh

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get apart.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a grown woman and I can barely get these apart after they’re put together. Thank god I didn’t spend the money on the big container of them. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mcm710

customer_reviews.title: Let little ones play like the older ines
customer_reviews.text: Loved product younger child wants everything the older siblings have, and this product was perfect. Same thing, but for smaller hands, and big enuf to see what she has made. She thought it was pretty cool hers was 4x the size of her brothers!
customer_reviews.author: ceharmony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for FINE MOTOR
customer_reviews.text: I use these to help build fine motor skills in my teaching; among other items. These blocks are big enough that the younger students can grab easily and colorful enough that they stay interested. Unlike traditional blocks these stay together and have a wider range of application for critical thinking and problem solving. A must for any classroom or early learner at home!
customer_reviews.author: rockne flugan

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! They love stacking them, connecting them, building them. I ended up buying more to keep some in the diaper bag for my littles to do in the car or whenever we are. They are perfect even for my 1 year old. He loves trying to put them together just like his 3 yr old brother!
customer_reviews.author: XtineMBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Fun but does not last as long as LEGOs
customer_reviews.text: We really had fun playing with it with my daughter but a bit disappointed regarding durability. Some pieces cannot stick together anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Kept my toddler occupied
customer_reviews.text: My toddler discovered these when someone nearby had them at church. I like getting toys that allow kids to be creative, and these are a lot of fun. I would definitely recommend the big size for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Inkus

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now ordered four different sets of these blocks. My grandkids ages 4, 3, 2, and 1 love them. Adults find them intriguing, too.
customer_reviews.author: Armchair Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quality toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son really likes these. It’s a simple, quality toy that fosters creativity and imagination. As others have reviewed, they’re nice for the car rides, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - lots of ideas for the kids. Very creative! We used this product to supplement what we already had.
customer_reviews.author: Laura ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for open ended play. My 20 month old really enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these! I had to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for so many things!
customer_reviews.text: These are a multi functional toy that can be used for much more than building. Our 2.5 year loves them for sorting colors, making roads and so much else. The large size is perfect for little hands. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! Easy to use and I love the bigger size! Pieces are big enough that they don’t go missing right away.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3 (BOYS!)

product_meta.title: PLUS PLUS BIG - Open Play Set - 90 Piece - Basic Color Mix, Construction Building Stem Toy, Interlocking Large Puzzle Blocks for Toddlers and Preschool
product_meta.description: Plus-plus is a whole new class of construction toy! One simple shape contains endless possibilities and hours of fun. Each piece easily connects to the next and lets your imagination Create colorful flat Mosaics or work in 3-D to make more intricate builds. A perfect on-the-go STEM toy for your budding Builder! This plus-plus big size is perfect for smaller hands or bigger ideas. Well-suited for preschool and early learning environments, This set brings endless fun to kids who are developing their motor skills and recognizing colors, patterns and sorting - all while mixing play and creativity! This 90 piece set contains basic colors, including red, blue, green, yellow, orange, purple and more. Also includes an idea guide booklet for building. Suggested for ages 18 months and up. Bpa-free and phthalate-free. Designed and made in Denmark.
feature_bullets: BUILDING SET INCLUDES: This open play set includes 90 BIG pieces and an idea guide booklet.

SUGGESTED FOR AGES: Friendly for ages 18 months and up, these BIG pieces are great for little hands or bigger ideas. Each piece measures 2" x 1 1/8". Well-suited for preschool and early learning environments mixing play and creativity!

SIMPLE DESIGN - FUELS CREATIVITY: One shape, endless possibilities! Every brick easily connects to the next. Create colorful flat mosaics or work in 3-D to make more intricate builds. Mix and match any Plus-Plus set to bring more ideas to life!
EDUCATIONAL FUN: Plus-Plus empowers children with free explorative play as they encourage fine motor skills, logic, creativity and imagination all without the use of screens. A great STEM toy.

PERFECT FOR ON-THE-GO: Design and build your creations any way you want, wherever you want! Great for every adventure – car rides, restaurants, a friend’s house, or in your own living room. Stay entertained for hours!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
